idea-plugin.name: OKLCH-converter
idea-plugin.description:
Convert CSS colors (hex, rgb, rgba) to OKLCH format directly in your editor.
Features: • Convert hex colors (#f00, #ff0000, #f00f, #ff0000ff) • Convert rgb() and rgba() color values • Preserves alpha channels • Input validation with clear error messages • Right-click context menu integration
Simply select a color code and choose "Convert to OKLCH" from the context menu to replace it with the oklch() equivalent.
